scripts.rename-modules: for f in `find .build -name '*.js'`; do echo "fixing filename on $f" && mv $f `echo $f | sed -e 's/\.js/\.mjs/'`; done;
scripts.rename-imports: for f in `find .build -name '*.js'`; do echo "fixing imports on $f" && sed -i '' -e "s/from '\.\(.*\)'/from '\.\1.mjs'/g" $f; done;
scripts.build: set -e; npm run compile; rm -rf lib/*; cp .build/src/*.mjs lib/;
scripts.compile:
set -e; echo '
compiling...'; npm run lint; rm -rf .build; tsc; npm run rename-imports; npm run rename-modules;
scripts.test: set -e; npm run compile; files=`ls .build/test/*.mjs`; for file in $files; do node --experimental-modules --no-warnings $file | tap --reporter=dot -; done
